content.text:
# 12th Hollywood Music in Media Awards

| previous = 2020
| next = 2022
| main =
}}
The 12th Hollywood Music in Media Awards were held on November 17, 2021 to recognize the best in music in film, TV, video games, commercials, and trailers. The nominations were announced on November 4, 2021. A new category named "Outstanding On-Screen Performance in a Film" was introduced.
Winners and nominees

** "Just Look Up" from Don't Look Up'' – Written by Nicholas Britell, Ariana Grande, Scott Mescudi and Taura Stinson; Performed by Ariana Grande and Kid Cudi

| valign="top"|

** "Follow Me Home" from Arlo the Alligator Boy – Written By Ryan Crego and Alex Geringas; Performed by Mary Lambert and Michael J. Woodard

** "Your Song Saved My Life" from Sing 2 – Written by Bono; Performed by U2
